text: I am glad to be able to share feedback, but I had several issues that left me frustrated. The account billing appeared incorrect on my latest statement, which caused confusion and extra follow-up. The outage events were poorly communicated, so I found myself waiting for an update that never arrived. The support team eventually clarified some details, but the resolution left me unsatisfied. Overall, this experience was not what I expected, and I am concerned about future bills.

I appreciate the opportunity to provide feedback. The service experience was adequate, not outstanding, but steady throughout the process. The billing was clear, and the statements arrived on time without surprises. The app and online portal functioned reliably most of the time, though I did encounter a minor glitch once. I would be comfortable with using the service again, though I would not consider it exceptional.

I am extremely satisfied with the service overall. From the moment I contacted support to the final invoice, everything was smooth and efficient. The billing was transparent, and the charges matched the plan I subscribed to without surprises. The outage issues we faced earlier were resolved quickly, and the portal updates were timely, which built trust. The pricing options available matched my needs, and the mobile app worked flawlessly for checking usage. I would definitely recommend Synergy WA based on this experience.
